path = file.path('../../../README.md')

---

```{r, echo = FALSE, results = 'asis'}
desc = packageDescription(litedown:::detect_pkg())
cat(
  "**Version:** ", desc$Version,
  paste0(" - [Source code](", strsplit(desc$URL, ",\\s*")[[1]][1], ")"),
  paste0(" - [Bug reports](", desc$BugReports, ")"),
  sep = ""
)
```
